survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their experience with various smartphone applications to help improve usability, functionality, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use smartphone apps on a daily basis?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale for easy selection. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage times.

script.question_text: How often do you use smartphone apps on a daily basis?

questions.question_text: Which types of apps do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted categories.

script.question_text: Which types of apps do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the most important feature you look for in a smartphone app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What is the most important feature you look for in a smartphone app?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the apps you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the apps you currently use?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with smartphone apps in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to filter respondents for follow-up questions if needed.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with smartphone apps in the past 6 months?
